Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.introductionText: Thank you for visiting my website! We are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your data when you use our services.
Privacy.informationWeCollectText: We collect information to improve our services and enhance your experience. The types of information we collect include:

informationWeCollectItems.personalInfo: Personal Identification Information (e.g., your name and email address) when provided by you voluntarily.
informationWeCollectItems.usageData: Usage Data such as your browser type, IP address, and how you interact with our website. This helps us analyze user behavior and improve our services.

Privacy.howWeUseYourDataText: We use your data for the following purposes:

howWeUseYourDataItems.personalize: To personalize your experience on our website.
howWeUseYourDataItems.provideServices: To provide, operate, and maintain our services.
howWeUseYourDataItems.improveFunctionality: To improve the functionality and usability of our website.
howWeUseYourDataItems.analyzeInteraction: To analyze and understand how users interact with our services to enhance the overall experience.
howWeUseYourDataItems.communicate: To communicate with you, such as providing support or updates.

Privacy.googleAnalyticsText: We use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google LLC, to understand how visitors interact with our website. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information about your use of the website, such as pages visited, time spent on the site, and referring websites. This data helps us analyze user behavior to improve the content and functionality of our website.
Privacy.googleAnalyticsOptOutText: You can opt out of Google Analytics tracking by installing the
Privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us understand your preferences and how you interact with our website. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings, though some features of our website may not function properly without them.
Privacy.thirdPartySharingText: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal data to third parties, except where it is necessary to provide services or comply with legal requirements. Google Analytics is the only third-party service provider involved, and data collected through Google Analytics may be processed by Google to provide web analytics services.
Privacy.securityOfInformationText: We take the security of your personal information seriously and use commercially acceptable measures to protect it. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
Privacy.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at {email}.
Privacy.changesToPolicyText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or services. The updated policy will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be revised accordingly.
Privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at:

Imprint.title: Imprint
Imprint.vatIdText: VAT identification number according to ¬ß 27 a of the German VAT Act
Imprint.accountabilityForContentText: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness, or topicality. According to statutory provisions, we are furthermore responsible for our own content on these web pages. In this context, please note that we are not obliged to monitor the transmitted or saved information of third parties, or investigate circumstances pointing to illegal activity.
Imprint.accountabilityForLinksText: Responsibility for the content of external links (to web pages of third parties) lies solely with the operators of the linked pages. No violations were evident to us at the time of linking. Should any legal infringement become known to us, we will remove the respective link immediately.
Imprint.privacyPolicyText1: This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google LLC. Google Analytics uses "cookies", which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users interact with the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States. We use this information to evaluate your use of the website, compile reports on website activity, and provide other services related to website activity and internet usage. You can prevent Google Analytics from using your data by installing the opt-out browser add-on provided by Google.
Imprint.privacyPolicyText2: For more information on how Google handles your data, please refer to their

Cookie.title: I use cookies on this site
Cookie.description: I use cookies to ensure you have the best possible experience on my website. For more details on how these cookies are used, please check out my cookie policy. By clicking "Accept", you agree to the use of cookies.
Cookie.descriptionSmall: I use cookies to make sure you have the best possible experience on my website. For more information, you can check out my cookie policy.
